python:
# Checks if the input number is even or odd


# Solution
def checkEven(num):
    if num > 0:
        return (num % 2) == 0
    else:
        print("Please give number greater than 0")


isEven = checkEven(3)
print(f"Is 3 an even number? {isEven}")

isEven = checkEven(4)
print(f"Is 4 an even number? {isEven}")
